attributes.action: bring classic vehicle road tax from 1972 back to any vehicle 25 years old or older
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
this it to bring classic road tax to start at 25 years old and older as alot of classic owners with classics who only do a few miles a year but have to pay full fee which is now unfair 
lets keep classics alive!!!!!
